pageContext.claim: “We've massively cut taxes for the middle class and small businesses to let working families keep more of their hard-earned money.”
pageContext.analysis: No matter how you slice it, the super wealthy do rather well under the tax bill. Not only do they benefit from a reduction in tax rates, but there are numerous other provisions that benefits the wealthy, including repeal of the alternative minimum tax and lower rate for pass-through entities. The top one percent end up with about 47 percent of the tax cuts, according to the Tax Policy Center.
